ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] My account
ygData.msgSnippet: D_ _ N this made me laugh. I remember the days where a 50ish toon was asking the same type questions after his besstest buddy Power leveled him to 50 and then
ygData.messageBody:
D_ _ N this made me laugh.

I remember the days where a 50ish toon was asking the
same type questions after his besstest buddy Power
leveled him to 50 and then turned him loose.

frodo: /shout Anyone know the town for halflings?

veteran eq'r: /who frodo all
Veteran eq'r: Frodo <level 55 druid>
veteran eq'r: "DAMN noob!"




LMAO





--- "D. Scott Smith" <scott@...> wrote:

> *chuckle*
>
> Ironic isn't it...
>
> I have been playing a little more... been away for
> about a year, and a
> friend explained to me that "ebayed toons" abound.
> She said, It gets a
> little ridiculous when a stripped level 70 wizzy
> asks you were Qeynos
> is. ROFL. Wow, now that's a lil bit sad.
>
> Supposedly when the last mass exodus came about,
> during the release of
> World of Warcraft , Lineage 2 and Everquest 2 among
> other games, the
> availability of "previously owned accounts"
> skyrocketed.... supply and
> demand anyone?
>
> I guess Sony saw that if you can't beat them, join
> them....... It's a
> strange strange virtual world /chuckle.
>
> Paria of the Tribunal
>
